channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple Just Became Less Valuable Than Alphabet/Google and the Timing Is Unsettling
item.description: Apple is in a boring stretch. Google is in a risky stretch. The reaction from Wall Street is unsurprising.

item.title: CES 2026: Sonys AFEELA 1 EV is back and road ready
item.description: Mashable checked out Sony's AFEELA 1 EV again at CES 2026, and found it focused more on refinement than flashy new features.

item.title: The 25 best gadgets we saw at CES 2026 — smart Lego, big TV innovation, a robovac with legs, and much more
item.description: From smart home to home theater to fitness to gaming to laptops – here's the tech you need to know this year.
